data.text: @SilvermanJacob Glenn is what happens when you are so bad at taking criticism you warp your entire personality around finding people who won't tell you that you're wrong, then assuming everything they say is right
@SilvermanJacob @Fire_Badger How to tell everyone your career revolves around you getting repeatedly hit in the head without actually saying it.
@SilvermanJacob @MattBinder Well, it will be funny to see these guys against joining the war in Ukraine and liberals supporting the war in Ukraine.
@SilvermanJacob I’m disgusted by all the idiots replying who think he said anything profound..
@SilvermanJacob He really just tried to “from the mouths of babes” a press conference by a UFC fighter
@SilvermanJacob first Greenwald retweets Tucker Max, and now this dope.
